module.name: selinuxutil
module.summary: Policy for SELinux policy and userland applications.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_checkpolicy
interface.summary: Execute checkpolicy in the checkpolicy domain.

interface.name: seutil_run_checkpolicy
interface.summary: Execute checkpolicy in the checkpolicy domain, and allow the specified role the checkpolicy domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the checkpolicy domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the checkpolicy domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_exec_checkpolicy
interface.summary: Execute checkpolicy in the caller domain.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_loadpolicy
interface.summary: Execute load_policy in the load_policy domain.

interface.name: seutil_run_loadpolicy
interface.summary: Execute load_policy in the load_policy domain, and allow the specified role the load_policy domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the load_policy domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the load_policy domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_exec_loadpolicy
interface.summary: Execute load_policy in the caller domain.

interface.name: seutil_read_loadpolicy
interface.summary: Read the load_policy program file.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_newrole
interface.summary: Execute newrole in the load_policy domain.

interface.name: seutil_run_newrole
interface.summary: Execute newrole in the newrole domain, and allow the specified role the newrole domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the newrole domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the newrole domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_exec_newrole
interface.summary: Execute newrole in the caller domain.

interface.name: seutil_dontaudit_signal_newrole
interface.summary: Do not audit the caller attempts to send a signal to newrole.

interface.name: seutil_sigchld_newrole
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to newrole.

interface.name: seutil_use_newrole_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use newrole file descriptors.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_restorecon
interface.summary: Execute restorecon in the restorecon domain.

interface.name: seutil_run_restorecon
interface.summary: Execute restorecon in the restorecon domain, and allow the specified role the restorecon domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the restorecon domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the restorecon domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_exec_restorecon
interface.summary: Execute restorecon in the caller domain.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_runinit
interface.summary: Execute run_init in the run_init domain.

interface.name: seutil_init_script_domtrans_runinit
interface.summary: Execute init scripts in the run_init domain.

desc.p: Execute init scripts in the run_init domain. This is used for the Gentoo integrated run_init.

interface.name: seutil_run_runinit
interface.summary: Execute run_init in the run_init domain, and allow the specified role the run_init domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the run_init domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the run_init domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_init_script_run_runinit
interface.summary: Execute init scripts in the run_init domain, and allow the specified role the run_init domain, and use the caller's terminal.

desc.p: Execute init scripts in the run_init domain, and allow the specified role the run_init domain, and use the caller's terminal.
This is used for the Gentoo integrated run_init.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the run_init domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the run_init domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_use_runinit_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use run_init file descriptors.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_setfiles
interface.summary: Execute setfiles in the setfiles domain.

interface.name: seutil_run_setfiles
interface.summary: Execute setfiles in the setfiles domain, and allow the specified role the setfiles domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the setfiles domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the setfiles domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_exec_setfiles
interface.summary: Execute setfiles in the caller domain.

interface.name: seutil_dontaudit_search_config
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the SELinux configuration directory (/etc/selinux).

interface.name: seutil_dontaudit_read_config
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read the SELinux userland configuration (/etc/selinux).

interface.name: seutil_read_config
interface.summary: Read the general SELinux configuration files.

interface.name: seutil_rw_config
interface.summary: Read and write the general SELinux configuration files.

interface.name: seutil_manage_selinux_config
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the general selinux configuration files.

interface.name: seutil_manage_config_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the general selinux configuration files.

interface.name: seutil_search_default_contexts
interface.summary: Search the policy directory with default_context files.

interface.name: seutil_read_default_contexts
interface.summary: Read the default_contexts files.

interface.name: seutil_manage_default_contexts
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the default_contexts files.

interface.name: seutil_read_file_contexts
interface.summary: Read the file_contexts files.

interface.name: seutil_rw_file_contexts
interface.summary: Read and write the file_contexts files.

interface.name: seutil_manage_file_contexts
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the file_contexts files.

interface.name: seutil_read_bin_policy
interface.summary: Read the SELinux binary policy.

interface.name: seutil_create_bin_policy
interface.summary: Create the SELinux binary policy.

interface.name: seutil_relabelto_bin_policy
interface.summary: Allow the caller to relabel a file to the binary policy type.

interface.name: seutil_manage_bin_policy
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete the SELinux binary policy.

interface.name: seutil_read_src_policy
interface.summary: Read SELinux policy source files.

interface.name: seutil_manage_src_policy
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete SELinux policy source files.

interface.name: seutil_domtrans_semanage
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run semanage.

interface.name: seutil_run_semanage
interface.summary: Execute semanage in the semanage domain, and allow the specified role the semanage domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the checkpolicy domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the semanage domain to use.

interface.name: seutil_manage_module_store
interface.summary: Full management of the semanage module store.

interface.name: seutil_get_semanage_read_lock
interface.summary: Get read lock on module store

interface.name: seutil_get_semanage_trans_lock
interface.summary: Get trans lock on module store
